name: Vikings
description:
Vikings is a frenzy game where you impersonate a northern raider in his search for loot. As always, nothing goes according to plan; villages will almost never let you raid their resources without a fight. Be careful, though, if you let yourself think about what you're doing, you might not make it out alive.

This game was created for the winter 2020 edition of the WonderJam. The theme of the event was "Frenzy". The three imposed styles were arcade, survival and adventure.
